attributes.action: ensure that when he is sacked Mr Speaker Martin is removed from his post with neither severance pay nor pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who fail in the spectacular fashion he has failed should NOT be rewarded for that failure, funded by the people most badly affected by the outcome of his spectacular failure.  He has already amassed his fortune out of profligate expense claims, it would be betrayal of and an affront to the taxpayers of this country to know they are to continue to keep him (and, of course, the ultra profligate Mrs Speaker) in the lifestyle which he/they have created for themselves through his greed, AND continued funding the survival of his dynasty, for the rest of his natural life.  It must not be allowed to happen.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
